title: The Manchurian Candidate
creator_credit: John Frankenheimer, Howard W. Koch, M.C. Productions and United Artists Corporation
brief_description: A brilliantly handled spy thriller! A Korean war ‘hero’ comes back a brainwashed zombie, triggered to kill a liberal politician… a human time bomb waiting to explode! Based on the novel by Richard Condon, this film stars Laurence Harvey and Angela Lansbury and Janet Leigh.
creator_credit_for_label: John Frankenheimer, Howard W. Koch, M.C. Productions and United Artists Corporation
